title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 301.3 - Size of sign
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 301.3 - Size of sign

State Regulations

The sign in the automated teller machine facility which
contains the information required by section
75-c
(3)(d)
of the Banking Law shall be of such
size as to make such information clearly visible from the entryway to the
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
301.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
